The 4th Carmen Awards ceremony, presented by the Andalusian Film Academy, took place on 1 February 2025 at the Gran Teatro in Córdoba. In January 2025, Macarena Gómez and Antonio Pagudo were announced as the gala hosts. Producer Antonio Pérez received the Honorary Carmen Award.
Winners and nominations
The winners and nominees are listed as follows:
